blog.name: critrolecloset
blog.title: critrolecloset
blog.description: tracking what the cast members of critical role wear on and off stream, mon-fri. also found on twitter and instagram!

summary: oh hey! i have a ko-fi now. for those unfamilar with the service, think of it as the internet version of a tip jar that links up...
body:
oh hey! i have a ko-fi now. for those unfamilar with the service, think of it as the internet version of a tip jar that links up with paypal. you may have seen artists, cosplayers, and overall creative types using it. some of you have reached out and suggested that i get one. personally, i’ve been struggling with the idea since i’m terrified as coming off as an opportunist, but i’m trying to let people do nice things for me and not feel smothered by imposter syndrome.

if you want to throw a few dollars my way for the amount of work i’ve put into this project, it would mean so much to me! but in no way do i expect to be compensated for doing this. critrolecloset will always be a fan account fueled by my love for the entire critical role community and nothing more. the quality and consistency of posts won’t change, i’m just leaving this here for anyone who wants to support me in this way.

thank you all,

shauni

tags: he literally liked my post about the honey heist being dick jokes and bear puns like two months ago
summary: I love that post that seems to think Foster is scuttling around here all incognito, hiding from the fandom, super spy mode when...
body:
I love that post that seems to think Foster is scuttling around here all incognito, hiding from the fandom, super spy mode when like, he’s literally just right there in the open.

He’s literally running around under his own name and has a picture of himself as his icon. He could not be more unsubtle about it.

summary: Also IDK why everyone is zeroing in on the fact that Molly didn’t want to fuck Caleb because I don’t think it was just Caleb....
body:
Also IDK why everyone is zeroing in on the fact that Molly didn’t want to fuck Caleb because I don’t think it was just Caleb.

Given the fact that he only wanted to fuck those who were in the right “mental place” for it, that almost certainly excludes our resident disaster lesbian in blue.

summary: How did Fjord destroy every ship but Fjord/Jester? I might have missed something
question: How did Fjord destroy every ship but Fjord/Jester? I might have missed something
answer: On Talks Machina last night Travis explained that he promised he would never do a D&D romance, and Laura took that as a challenge.

summary: Back from work and watching the latest “Between the Sheets” and it’s so weird being someone that grew up in Jersey and currently...
body: Back from work and watching the latest “Between the Sheets” and it’s so weird being someone that grew up in Jersey and currently living in Jersey(I’ve been all over the east coast, but back in Jersey and happy to be). It feels good though for some reason.

blog.name: nelsynoo
blog.title: Once More Unto the Breach
blog.description:
29 year old with a penchant for baking, shopping and broadway musicals. I have both a Masters Degree in War and an alarmingly extensive Disney collection.

I like to read, go rock-climbing, peruse art galleries and play Bioware games over and over while making the same choices each time.

summary: I'm excited for you to start campaign 2!! it's more polished and the players more relaxed, and they all start off as strangers...
question: I'm excited for you to start campaign 2!! it's more polished and the players more relaxed, and they all start off as strangers which is really fun! I'm sure it'll get heavier but the overall tone is a little lighter too
answer:
I’m excited to start campaign 2 too!! I remember when I started campaign 1, I really struggled to get into it (in fact I stopped after a couple of episodes and had to try again many months later). There were so many episodes in the early days where they spent a REALLY LONG TIME just talking and planning (which inevitably never worked out how they thought it would anyway). The pace got a lot slicker as they got better at the game and Matt got better at pushing them into plot points. So I’m definitely looking forward to seeing the start of campaign 2 while knowing that they won’t have those same pacing issues as before.

I’m SUPER excited to meet all the characters - because I know I will love ALL OF THEM, just like I do with Vox Machina.

And while I’m sad I’ve finished campaign 1, I’m also glad? Because their story was over, you know? All the characters have grown and developed - with such beautifully crafted narratives it’s almost hard to believe that it wasn’t all pre-planned. And they’re now all so powerful that there’s not much that Matt could throw at them that would pose an actual challenge. 

Their story is complete and perfect and whole.

And now I can’t wait to hear another one…

blog.name: theoldgaylion
blog.title: Sauntering Vaguely Downwards
blog.description:
Josh • they/them • lv. 22 • aquarius • INTJ • Italy

about :
• moody trashcan™
• cats and owls enthusiastic
• 46% anxious, 31% bitter, 18% sleepy, 5% horny
• Captain Flint and Father Marcus are my angry sad gay dads
• willing to die for Caleb Widogast and Nott the brave
• happily married to Adore Delano
• sometimes nsfw

tags: i love these two so so much
idk if anyone can agree with these hcs buuuut whatever
thanks for the ask honey çç
summary: Shipping meme: Widomauk 🖤
question: Shipping meme: Widomauk 🖤
answer:
Thanks sweetie 😍 okay let’s do it *sweats*

  • falls asleep on the couch: BOTH OF THEM OKAY? Like Molly falls asleep watching episode after episode of his fav tv series, and he SNORES when he sleeps (im sorry it’s a thing i find hilarious, a character usually all so charming and cool who SNORES loudly when they sleep ksjdksajk call me a weirdo idc), while Caleb falls asleep with his face buried in one of his books. Since both of them are weak and can’t even lift a potato without sweating (just kidding, they don’t like potatoes lolol), they don’t put the other in their bed, like Molly snuggles next to Caleb and sleeps there with him like the cat he is; Caleb puts a blanket on Molly tucking him in and kisses him between his horns without waking him up *slams a fist on the table* THEY ARE CUTE 😭😭
  • makes friends with the neighbors: MOLLYYYY, because he’s all smiles and little talks, he’s good at getting people to like him, and Caleb is very happy to let him do it because he still struggles with social anxiety, but he’s getting better thanks to his boyfriend 😌
  • is the adventurous eater: Molly? Like “Caleb! Oh, this looks good!! let’s try it!!” and Caleb frowns, not sure (we can agree that Molly has strange tastes even in food pls), then they end up ordering whatever Molly wants to eat and sometimes Caleb happens to like it, he’s more picky than his boyfriend djksjakdas
  • hogs the covers at night: since Molly’s blood runs hotter than humans’ and he doesn’t really need to warm himself that much, Caleb hogs them. He’s not chilly, you know, but the covers smell like lavender and incense, smell good, smell like Molly, it calms him and he sleeps better, especially when Molly is away 🌸
  • forgets to do the dishes: Caleb lazy ass, and Molly ends up doing them because he doesn’t like to live in a dumpster thank you very much “Caleb, I don’t want flies as pets” 
  • tries to surprise their partner more often: Molly, he’s made that way, he’s kind and wants to make the people he loves happy, he makes gifts, even small ones, gifts he knows Caleb will sure like and Caleb’s heart melts because how can a person like Molly loves him?? Wtf??? But Molly is ready to shake those thoughts away and show him he’s worth it ;;
  • leaves dirty laundry on the floor: CALEB, HE’S A DIRTY LAUNDRY HIMSELF (we stan a hobo ❤️), there’s always a pile of clothes on the floor in their room and when enough is enough, Molly picks the clothes and Caleb and puts all in the washer JKAJSKAKSDNDJ 
  • stays up til 2 AM reading: Caleb, OBVIOUSLY. After midnight he starts reading smut and when Molly gets up to take a piss and finds him still awake with hooded, red eyes from watching the phone’s screen for too long, he shakes his head and convince him to sleep 😏 he can be veeery persuasive 😏😏 
  • sings in the shower: both, Molly fucking performs when he’s showering, like picks a shampoo bottle and starts singing out loud, he dances swaying his tail with flourish (he has a playlist on Spotify for when he’s in the bathroom okay? okay), while Caleb listens to the radio and hums quietly when it plays a song he knows and likes 
  • takes the selfies: Molly, he’s a selfies bitch and he loves to have memories of himself and Caleb together (since….you know…. i think he could be somewhat terrified of forgetting…. and… doesn’t have…. many……for reasons…..), Caleb doesn’t smile in the photos tho, he’s not the type, he just stares longingly at Molly or kisses him on the cheek
  • plans date night: Caleb. Maybe I’m wrong, but considering that he suffers from anxiety and I know it myself how hard things can be with that bitch playing with your head, I think he plans their dates ahead because he wants to have things under his controls. Molly knows that and when it’s the one who makes plans for their dates, he avoids things Caleb doesn’t like or make him uncomfortable 

ask me!

  • takes the selfies: Molly, he’s a selfies bitch and he loves to have memories of himself and Caleb together (since….you know…. i think he could be somewhat terrified of forgetting…. and… doesn’t have…. many……for reasons…..), Caleb doesn’t smile in the photos tho, he’s not the type, he just stares longingly at Molly or kisses him on the cheek
  • plans date night: Caleb. Maybe I’m wrong, but considering that he suffers from anxiety and I know it myself how hard things can be with that bitch playing with your head, I think he plans their dates ahead because he wants to have things under his controls. Molly knows that and when it’s the one who makes plans for their dates, he avoids things Caleb doesn’t like or make him uncomfortable 

ask me!
trail.content:
Thanks sweetie 😍 okay let’s do it *sweats*

  • falls asleep on the couch: BOTH OF THEM OKAY? Like Molly falls asleep watching episode after episode of his fav tv series, and he SNORES when he sleeps (im sorry it’s a thing i find hilarious, a character usually all so charming and cool who SNORES loudly when they sleep ksjdksajk call me a weirdo idc), while Caleb falls asleep with his face buried in one of his books. Since both of them are weak and can’t even lift a potato without sweating (just kidding, they don’t like potatoes lolol), they don’t put the other in their bed, like Molly snuggles next to Caleb and sleeps there with him like the cat he is; Caleb puts a blanket on Molly tucking him in and kisses him between his horns without waking him up *slams a fist on the table* THEY ARE CUTE 😭😭
  • makes friends with the neighbors: MOLLYYYY, because he’s all smiles and little talks, he’s good at getting people to like him, and Caleb is very happy to let him do it because he still struggles with social anxiety, but he’s getting better thanks to his boyfriend 😌
  • is the adventurous eater: Molly? Like “Caleb! Oh, this looks good!! let’s try it!!” and Caleb frowns, not sure (we can agree that Molly has strange tastes even in food pls), then they end up ordering whatever Molly wants to eat and sometimes Caleb happens to like it, he’s more picky than his boyfriend djksjakdas
  • hogs the covers at night: since Molly’s blood runs hotter than humans’ and he doesn’t really need to warm himself that much, Caleb hogs them. He’s not chilly, you know, but the covers smell like lavender and incense, smell good, smell like Molly, it calms him and he sleeps better, especially when Molly is away 🌸
  • forgets to do the dishes: Caleb lazy ass, and Molly ends up doing them because he doesn’t like to live in a dumpster thank you very much “Caleb, I don’t want flies as pets” 
  • tries to surprise their partner more often: Molly, he’s made that way, he’s kind and wants to make the people he loves happy, he makes gifts, even small ones, gifts he knows Caleb will sure like and Caleb’s heart melts because how can a person like Molly loves him?? Wtf??? But Molly is ready to shake those thoughts away and show him he’s worth it ;;
  • leaves dirty laundry on the floor: CALEB, HE’S A DIRTY LAUNDRY HIMSELF (we stan a hobo ❤️), there’s always a pile of clothes on the floor in their room and when enough is enough, Molly picks the clothes and Caleb and puts all in the washer JKAJSKAKSDNDJ 
  • stays up til 2 AM reading: Caleb, OBVIOUSLY. After midnight he starts reading smut and when Molly gets up to take a piss and finds him still awake with hooded, red eyes from watching the phone’s screen for too long, he shakes his head and convince him to sleep 😏 he can be veeery persuasive 😏😏 
  • sings in the shower: both, Molly fucking performs when he’s showering, like picks a shampoo bottle and starts singing out loud, he dances swaying his tail with flourish (he has a playlist on Spotify for when he’s in the bathroom okay? okay), while Caleb listens to the radio and hums quietly when it plays a song he knows and likes 
  • takes the selfies: Molly, he’s a selfies bitch and he loves to have memories of himself and Caleb together (since….you know…. i think he could be somewhat terrified of forgetting…. and… doesn’t have…. many……for reasons…..), Caleb doesn’t smile in the photos tho, he’s not the type, he just stares longingly at Molly or kisses him on the cheek
  • plans date night: Caleb. Maybe I’m wrong, but considering that he suffers from anxiety and I know it myself how hard things can be with that bitch playing with your head, I think he plans their dates ahead because he wants to have things under his controls. Molly knows that and when it’s the one who makes plans for their dates, he avoids things Caleb doesn’t like or make him uncomfortable 

ask me!

summary: also *eyes emoji* at captain avantica’s blood sacrifice supporting my theory that when the kraken first said “consume” to fjord,...
body: also *eyes emoji* at captain avantica’s blood sacrifice supporting my theory that when the kraken first said “consume” to fjord, it meant fjord giving the kraken some of his blood, not fjord fucking swallowing his sword (esp because matt described the sword cutting fjord’s throat in great detail)
